CatDescriptText: Nicholas P. Lomakin (c.1917-2001) owned several Lomakin Music Co. stores around Pittsburgh. The last one, located at 633 Liberty Avenue, closed in 1984.
TitMainTitle: Lomakin Music Company, with advertisement in window for "Toot-A-Toon Singing Trombone," and Golomb Window Glass next door, 1532 Centre Avenue, Hill District
